mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sale(seller_id, item_id, barcode, expiration_date, registered_at) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{itemId}, #{barcode}, #{expirationDate}, #{registeredAt})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT barcode FROM sale WHERE barcode = #{barcode})
SELECT expiration_date, COUNT(*) count FROM sale WHERE item_id = #{itemId} AND expiration_status = 0 AND purchase_status = 0 GROUP BY expiration_date ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE sale SET purchase_status = #{purchaseStatus}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{saleId}
